attributes.action: take action as well as his Ministers  take action in the near future to detain admitted illegal aliens, illegal entrants and illegal immigrants known to them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned urge the Prime Minister, Gordon Brown, and his ministers to implement their immigration laws and other laws in the near future to detain admitted illegal aliens, illegal entrants and illegal immigrants known to them.  

Names and identities will be sent again if requested. 

Previously supplied by MP and others to the Prime Minister and to his Home Secretary.


Previous Petition to the Prime Minister not published without any reason.
